title: NCBS Notification 2026 - Apply Online for Technical Trainee Posts
description: The National Centre for Biological Sciences (NCBS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Technical Trainee Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree or Diploma can apply for the NCBS Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, a...
